author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Flagstaff, AZ has developed a draft Report on Roof Collapses and Snow Load Requirements Study (attached) and is hoping to get feedback from other communities regarding three critical issues that we struggled with in our study:

What are the snow load requirements (pounds per square foot)?
How are snow removal orders disseminated (Press Release, Social Media, E-mails etc)?
How are the snow fall accumulated weights calculated (internal gauging system, utilizing national weather service, etc)?

I would also like any feedback you can provide regarding our draft study if you have the time.
Thank you!
Mike Iacona
Fire Chief
City of Flagstaff, AZ
928-779-7688
miacona@ci.flagstaff.az.us
